text: Mata anata no omo ga (sakini) tenshi-tachi ni mukatte,`hontōni ware wa, chijō ni dairi-sha o okudearou.' To ōse rareta toki o omoiokose. Kare-ra wa mōshiageta. `Anata wa chijō de aku o okonai, chiwonagasu-sha o oka reru nodesu ka. Watashi-tachi wa, anata o tataete 唱念 Shi, mata anata no shinsei o Jō Bi shite imasu no ni.' Kare wa ōse rareta. `Hontōni ware wa anata gataga shiranai koto o shitte iru
